tool_description: Access thousands of awesome hobby ideas. This API provides a random hobby along with a Wikipedia link detailing the hobby.

api_list.name: /v1/hobbies
api_list.description: Returns a random hobby and a Wikipedia link detailing the hobby.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Hobby category. Possible values are: general, sports_and_outdoors, education, collection, competition, observation.
